CLUE: Author Hemmingway, and Oscar Wilde's hero
FOUND IN: Ernest Hemingway - Known for his simple yet powerful writing style, Hemingway is often associated with the "Lost Generation" of writers who came of age during World War I and the Roaring Twenties

CLUE: Lymphatic tissue at the back of the mouth
FOUND IN: Reticular tonsils: These are located on both sides of the back of the throat and play a crucial role in filtering out pathogens and debris from the air we breathe.
